>>>> Hey Heath,
>>>>

>>>> Article No Month Topic
>>>> 1 September What is a medical referral letter?
>>>> 2 September Why do specialists and doctors require a referral?
>>>> 3 September Common injuries an orthopaedic surgeon can treat
>>>> 4 September What conditions do neurologists treat/Why might you see a neurologist?
>>>> 1 October What’s the difference between a Gynaecologist and an Obstetrician?
>>>> 2 October How much does it cost to go to a specialist?
>>>> 3 October How to choose the best surgeon/medical specialist for you?
>>>> 4 October What conditions does an ENT Specialist treat?

>>>>
>>>> Hi Brittany,
>>>>
>>>> Thanks for the below. I’m fine with all of them except:
>>>>
>>>> What does a Gynaecologist do?
>>>> What does an ENT specialist do?
>>>>
>>>> They seem a little obvious and could affect our credibility with the specialists.
>>>>
>>>> How about something like:
>>>>
>>>> Should I visit a Gynaecologist or my GP?
>>>> What’s the difference between a Gynaecologist and an Obstetrician?
>>>> Can a Gynaecologist help me with (insert high volume condition(s))?
>>>>
>>>> What’s the difference between an Otolaryngologists, Head and Neck Surgeons and an ENT Surgeon?
>>>> What conditions does an ENT Specialist treat?
>>>> Do I need a referral to see an ENT Specialist?
>>>> Just something with a little more excitement in the title I guess? I hope that makes sense?
>>>>
>>>> Thanks,
>>>> Heath Maguire
>>>> DIRECTOR
>>>>
>>>> Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300 072 134>
>>>> Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415 162 271>
>>>> Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
